caption.p: A schematic representation of a direct pre-lithiation method ( a), cyclic voltammogram curves of the pristine CNT ( b), pre-lithiated CNT for 1 min ( c), pre-lithiated CNT for 3 min ( d), pre-lithiated CNT for 15 min ( e) and pre-lithiated CNT for 30 min ( f) recorded at a scan rate of 0.2 mV s −1 in a potential range of 0.01–2 V vs. Li/Li +.
